ground_truth_bugs.description: topic-meta-data h5 a lightness inverted from 30% to 70% in light theme
mobile modal .custom-message-length lightness changed from 70% to 30% in light theme (inconsistent with desktop)
.name selector lightness changed from 30% to 50% (inconsistent with PR pattern)
.name selector lightness changed from 30% to 50% (mobile variant of bug 3)

golden_false_positives.golden_comment: In topic-post.css the original code used $lightness: 70% but the replacement uses $lightness: 30% for the light theme. This makes the text significantly darker than intended.
golden_false_positives.reasoning: The claim is factually incorrect. After examining the full diff of topic-post.scss, no change goes from 70% to 30% for light theme. The notable change (.topic-meta-data h5 a) goes the opposite direction (30% to 70%). The golden comment has the values reversed.
